name: netfilter
description: Netfilter - An efficient blocker for ads, trackers, coin miners, popups, annoying anti-blockers, malware sites, etc.

scripts.zip:chrome: NODE_ENV=production BROWSER=chrome npm run build && (cd dist; zip -r ../chrome.zip .)
scripts.zip:firefox: NODE_ENV=production BROWSER=firefox npm run build && (cd dist; zip -r ../firefox.zip .)
scripts.zip: npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:chrome

author: Haikel Fazzani
